left.title: Connect with Pet Lovers Worldwide
left.paragraph: Explore the joy of pet life and share your unique story with pet lovers worldwide. Here, you can enjoy a wonderful life with pets and discover all sorts of fun and interesting things about them.

right.title: Create an Account
right.signinHint: Already have an account? Sign in here.
right.user_min_err: Username must be at least 5 characters.
right.user_max_err: Username must be at most 25 characters.
right.user_regex_err: Username can only contain letters and numbers.
right.password_min_err: Password must be at least 6 characters and contain at least one letter and one number.
right.password_regex_err: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, or one number.
right.privacy: By clicking Create Account, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
